name: Secret of Poop
description:
Darkness sweeps the troubled drain as, sewage’s power fades… People sitting on their porcelain throne unsuspecting… Shit, Dookie, Feces… The Poop has many names, for it has been celebrated in emojis and poems throughout time, but all of these speak to just one: Poop of the Poop

Defeat the Poop! Collect Chocolate to survive!

(NOTE: It’s not balanced, you can’t poop at the moment.)

Controls
Movement: W A S D or Arrow Keys
Interact: E or Right Mouse
Attack: Space or Left Mouse
